Animation Demos

These demos show scroll-driven animations on the lay-out container itself using the animate-self attribute.
Scroll down to see the containers animate as they enter the viewport.

View Animation Items Demos

↓ Scroll down to see animations ↓

Bounce Animations

bounce()

Container bounces in. <lay-out animate-self="bounce()" lg="columns(3)">

bounce-in-up()

Container bounces in from below. <lay-out animate-self="bounce-in-up()" lg="columns(3)" style="transform-origin: bottom center;">

bounce-in-down()

Container bounces in from above. <lay-out animate-self="bounce-in-down()" lg="columns(3)">

bounce-in-left()

Container bounces in from left. <lay-out animate-self="bounce-in-left()" lg="columns(3)">

bounce-in-right()

Container bounces in from right. <lay-out animate-self="bounce-in-right()" lg="columns(3)">

Fade Animations

fade-up()

Container fades in and moves up. <lay-out animate-self="fade-up()" lg="columns(3)">

fade-up-left()

Container fades in and moves up-left. <lay-out animate-self="fade-up-left()" lg="columns(3)">

fade-up-right()

Container fades in and moves up-right. <lay-out animate-self="fade-up-right()" lg="columns(3)">

fade-down()

Container fades in and moves down. <lay-out animate-self="fade-down()" lg="columns(3)">

fade-down-left()

Container fades in and moves down-left. <lay-out animate-self="fade-down-left()" lg="columns(3)">

fade-down-right()

Container fades in and moves down-right. <lay-out animate-self="fade-down-right()" lg="columns(3)">

fade-left()

Container fades in and moves left. <lay-out animate-self="fade-left()" lg="columns(3)">

fade-right()

Container fades in and moves right. <lay-out animate-self="fade-right()" lg="columns(3)">

fade-in()

Container fades in (opacity only). <lay-out animate-self="fade-in()" lg="columns(3)">

flip-up()

Container flips up. <lay-out animate-self="flip-up()" lg="columns(3)" style="transform-style: preserve-3d;">

flip-down()

Container flips down. <lay-out animate-self="flip-down()" lg="columns(3)" style="transform-style: preserve-3d;">

flip-left()

flip-right()

flip-diagonal()

Container flips diagonally. <lay-out animate-self="flip-diagonal()" lg="columns(3)" style="transform-style: preserve-3d;">

reveal()

Container reveals via clip-path inset. <lay-out animate-self="reveal()" lg="columns(3)">

reveal-circle()

Container reveals via circular clip-path. <lay-out animate-self="reveal-circle()" lg="columns(3)">

reveal-polygon()

Container reveals via polygon clip-path. <lay-out animate-self="reveal-polygon()" lg="columns(3)">

Slide Animations

slide-up()

Container slides up. <lay-out animate-self="slide-up()" lg="columns(3)">

slide-down()

Container slides down. <lay-out animate-self="slide-down()" lg="columns(3)">

slide-in()

Container slides in (from left). <lay-out animate-self="slide-in()" lg="columns(3)">

Zoom Animations

zoom-in()

Container zooms in. <lay-out animate-self="zoom-in()" lg="columns(3)">

zoom-in-rotate()

Container zooms in and rotates. <lay-out animate-self="zoom-in-rotate()" lg="columns(3)">

zoom-out-rotate()

Container zooms out and rotates. <lay-out animate-self="zoom-out-rotate()" lg="columns(3)">

zoom-out()

Container zooms out (from large to normal). <lay-out animate-self="zoom-out()" lg="columns(3)">

Animation Multipliers

Use a multiplier (1–3) to control animation intensity. Default is 1×.

fade-up — Default vs 2× vs 3×

Default intensity (110px translation). <lay-out animate-self="fade-up()" lg="columns(3)">
2× intensity (220px translation). <lay-out animate-self="fade-up(2)" lg="columns(3)">
3× intensity (330px translation). <lay-out animate-self="fade-up(3)" lg="columns(3)">

Custom Easings

Apply custom easings with the easing attribute (e.g. ease-spring-1, ease-elastic-1, ease-bounce-1, ease-out-4).

slide-in() with easing="ease-elastic-1"

Elastic overshoot effect. <lay-out animate-self="slide-in()" easing="ease-elastic-1" lg="columns(3)">

zoom-in() with easing="ease-bounce-1"

Gravity-like bounce effect. <lay-out animate-self="zoom-in()" easing="ease-bounce-1" lg="columns(3)">

Pace — Entry Speed

Control how quickly the animation completes during entry. Default is entry 0% to entry 75%.

fade-up() pace="fast"

Narrow scroll range — snappy animation. <lay-out animate-self="fade-up()" pace="fast" lg="columns(3)">

fade-up() pace="slow"

Full entry phase — gentle animation. <lay-out animate-self="fade-up()" pace="slow" lg="columns(3)">

fade-up() pace="slower"

Spills into contain phase — very gradual. <lay-out animate-self="fade-up()" pace="slower" lg="columns(3)">

Pace — Entry Phase

Control when the animation plays relative to the element's visibility.

zoom-in() pace="contain"

Plays while element is fully visible in viewport. <lay-out animate-self="zoom-in()" pace="contain" lg="columns(3)">

reveal-circle() pace="cover"

Plays while element covers the viewport. <lay-out animate-self="reveal-circle()" pace="cover" lg="columns(3)">

Pace — Exit

Add an exit token to play the animation in reverse as the element scrolls out.

fade-up() pace="exit"

Fades up on entry, reverses on exit. <lay-out animate-self="fade-up()" pace="exit" lg="columns(3)">

zoom-in() pace="exit-fast"

Zooms in on entry, snappy reverse on exit. <lay-out animate-self="zoom-in()" pace="exit-fast" lg="columns(3)">

flip-up() pace="exit-slow"

Flips up on entry, slow reverse starting in contain phase. <lay-out animate-self="flip-up()" pace="exit-slow" lg="columns(3)">

Pace — Combined Entry + Exit

Mix entry speed and exit tokens for independent control.

fade-up() pace="slow exit-fast"

Slow entry, snappy exit. <lay-out animate-self="fade-up()" pace="slow exit-fast" lg="columns(3)">

zoom-in() pace="fast exit-slow"

Fast entry, gradual exit. <lay-out animate-self="zoom-in()" pace="fast exit-slow" lg="columns(3)">

reveal() pace="contain exit"

Reveal during contain phase, reverse on exit. <lay-out animate-self="reveal()" pace="contain exit" lg="columns(3)">
